def transform(sequence):
    count = sequence.count("0")
    new_sequence = sequence.replace("0", "", count)
    new_sequence = new_sequence[:new_sequence.rindex("0")+1] + count*"0" + new_sequence[new_sequence.rindex("0")+1:]
    return new_sequence

def transform(sequence):
    count = sequence.count("0")
    new_sequence = sequence.replace("0", "", count)
    new_sequence = new_sequence[:new_sequence.rindex("0")+1] + count*"0" + new_sequence[new_sequence.rindex("0")+1:]
    return new_sequence
